string.name: hello_world
string.Data:
HelpMe! is a handy app for cases when personal security is an issue. Imagine when walking down a dark alley that looks unsafe, how can you call for help in the case of an emergency without endangering your life? Using HelpMe application it\'s simple. In such cases, start the app and keep holding on the large "HOLD" button till you are somewhere safe. In the chance of some emergency situation, all you have to do is take your hand off the button and within 5 seconds a call is made to a set contact as well as a message, sent to your primary contact with your gps coordinates

HelpMe! also provides an anti-theft feature-if your phone is stolen or lost, just send an SMS to your number with the keyword set in settings(default value is "HELPME_START") and the phone\'s location will be sent back as SMS to the number! Awesome, right?


Step-1
Ensure GPS is on.

Step-2
Select the primary number to be called in the case of an emergency

Step-3
Select the primary number (and/or secondary) to be texted in the case of an emergency

Step-4
Click the START Button

Step-5
Hold the "HOLD" button and release when the emergency numbers are to be contacted. To stop the application, double tap on the Cancel button

resources.string: Note: If the safe button is not double tapped within 5-seconds of release of the PUSH button, a call is made to this number
Note: Please enable gps connectivity (if not already done) to use all the features of the app
Note: If the safe button is not double tapped within 5-seconds of release of the PUSH button, a text is sent to the set numbers with the GPS Location (if available) of the user
